# UIAccessibilityCustomAction.Handler

**Type Alias**

A closure type that defines a handler to perform for an action.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor typealias Handler = (UIAccessibilityCustomAction) -> Bool
```

## Actions

- **UIAccessibilityAction**: A set of methods that accessibility elements can use to support specific actions.
- **UIAccessibilityCustomAction**: A custom action to perform on an accessible object.
- **Delivering an exceptional accessibility experience**: Make improvements to your app’s interaction model to support assistive technologies such as VoiceOver.
